scripts.f7CopyRes: yarn run f7Copy && sleep 10 && yarn run f7CopyIcons
scripts.pgCopy: cp -R dist/build.js res index.html assets lib mb2-twitter/www && yarn run f7CopyRes
scripts.pgRunIos: cd mb2-twitter && phonegap platforms remove ios && phonegap run ios
scripts.pgRunAndroid: cd mb2-twitter && phonegap platforms remove android && phonegap run android
scripts.pgIos: yarn run build && yarn run pgClean && yarn run pgCopy && yarn run pgRunIos
scripts.pgAndroid: yarn run build && yarn run pgClean && yarn run pgCopy && yarn run pgRunAndroid
